response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. Considering its worth to both you and my company, I propose to offer it to you for $12,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 12000}
